channel.title: RSCA Base Report problems
channel.description:
Alright i've gotten everything in the RSCD forums to work with the RSCA base except fetching the reports from the administration panel. I've been trying to work on it and gotten it down to this line that's messing with me but i'm pretty bad with php so i can't figure out whats causing the "Error: Unable to fetch report list" error.
this is the line in the admin_rscd_reports file: [code]$result = $db->query('SELECT p.user, p.username, p.banned, p.owner, u.username AS owner_username, b.id AS b_id, COUNT(r.id) AS offences, MAX(time) AS last_time, g.g_title, o.ip AS o_ip FROM '.$db->prefix.'rsca2_reports AS r INNER JOIN '.$db->prefix.'rsca2_players AS p ON p.user=r.about LEFT JOIN '.$db->prefix.'users AS u ON u.id=p.owner LEFT JOIN '.$db->prefix.'bans AS b ON b.username LIKE u.username LEFT JOIN '.$db->prefix.'groups AS g ON g.g_id=u.group_id LEFT JOIN '.$db->prefix.'rsca2_online AS o ON o.user=r.about WHERE r.zapped IS NULL GROUP BY r.about ORDER BY '.$db->escape($order).' DESC') or error('Unable to fetch report list', __FILE__, __LINE__, $db->error()); [/code]
if anyone might have any tips or knows why i might be getting the error i would be very thankful if you helped because this is really annoying me because i've been tweaking it forever and can't quite figure out what to do.

item.title: RSCA Base Report problems
item.dc:creator: @Spyke8x Spyke8x
item.description:
@Spyke8x wrote:

Peeter:

define PUN_DEBUG @ your php file to see the full error message.

Thanks doing it now. Forgot all about being able to enable debug…

EDIT* FUCK YEAH FOUND THE SYNTAX ERROR thanks Peeter

Read full topic

item.title: RSCA Base Report problems
item.dc:creator: @Spyke8x Spyke8x
item.description:
@Spyke8x wrote:

Alright i’ve gotten everything in the RSCD forums to work with the RSCA base except fetching the reports from the administration panel. I’ve been trying to work on it and gotten it down to this line that’s messing with me but i’m pretty bad with php so i can’t figure out whats causing the “Error: Unable to fetch report list” error.

this is the line in the admin_rscd_reports file:

$result = $db->query('SELECT p.user, p.username, p.banned, p.owner, u.username AS owner_username, b.id AS b_id, COUNT(r.id) AS offences, MAX(time) AS last_time, g.g_title, o.ip AS o_ip FROM '.$db->prefix.'rsca2_reports AS r INNER JOIN '.$db->prefix.'rsca2_players AS p ON p.user=r.about LEFT JOIN '.$db->prefix.'users AS u ON u.id=p.owner LEFT JOIN '.$db->prefix.'bans AS b ON b.username LIKE u.username LEFT JOIN '.$db->prefix.'groups AS g ON g.g_id=u.group_id LEFT JOIN '.$db->prefix.'rsca2_online AS o ON o.user=r.about WHERE r.zapped IS NULL GROUP BY r.about ORDER BY '.$db->escape($order).' DESC') or error('Unable to fetch report list', __FILE__, __LINE__, $db->error());

if anyone might have any tips or knows why i might be getting the error i would be very thankful if you helped because this is really annoying me because i’ve been tweaking it forever and can’t quite figure out what to do.

Read full topic
